# Padding

## `padding`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |
| `$unit` | `string` | (optional) Example: `8px` |


## `padding-0`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `padding-sm`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `padding-md`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `padding-lg`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `padding-top`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |

| `$unit` | `string` | (optional) Example: `8px` |
